code:
flowchart TD
    A[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] --> B[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    B --> C[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    C --> D[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    D --> E{IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream}
    E -->|Learning Query| F[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    E -->|Progress Check| G[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    E -->|Help Request| H[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    E -->|Goal Setting| I[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

    F --> J[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    G --> K[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    H --> L[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    I --> M[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

    J --> N[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    K --> O{IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode}
    L --> P[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    M --> Q[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

    O -->|At Risk| R[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    O -->|On Track| S[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    O -->|Excelling| T[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    R --> U[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    S --> V[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    T --> W[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]

    U --> X[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    V --> Y[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    W --> Z[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

    X --> AA[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    Y --> BB[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    Z --> CC[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

    N --> DD[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    P --> EE[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    Q --> FF[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

    DD --> GG[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    EE --> HH{IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController}
    FF --> II[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

    GG --> JJ{IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker}
    HH -->|Frustrated| KK[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    HH -->|Motivated| LL[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    HH -->|Neutral| MM[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    JJ -->|Yes| NN[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    JJ -->|No| OO[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

    KK --> PP[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    LL --> QQ[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    MM --> RR[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

    AA --> SS[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    BB --> TT[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    CC --> UU[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

    PP --> VV[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    QQ --> WW[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    RR --> XX[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

    SS --> YY[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    TT --> ZZ[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    UU --> AAA[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

    NN --> BBB[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    OO --> CCC[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

    VV --> DDD[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    WW --> DDD
    XX --> DDD

    YY --> EEE[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    ZZ --> EEE
    AAA --> EEE

    BBB --> FFF{IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic}
    CCC --> GGG[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    FFF -->|Positive| HHH[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    FFF -->|Negative| III[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    FFF -->|Neutral| JJJ[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    GGG --> KKK[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]

    DDD --> LLL[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    EEE --> MMM[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

    HHH --> NNN[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    III --> OOO[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    JJJ --> PPP[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    KKK --> QQQ[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

    LLL --> RRR[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    MMM --> SSS[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]

    NNN --> TTT[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    OOO --> TTT
    PPP --> TTT

    QQQ --> UUU[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

    RRR --> VVV{IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream}
    SSS --> WWW[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]

    VVV -->|Yes| XXX[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    VVV -->|No| YYY[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    XXX --> C
    YYY --> ZZZ[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]

    TTT --> AAAA[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    UUU --> BBBB[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    WWW --> CCCC[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]

    ZZZ --> DDDD[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]
    AAAA --> EEEE[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    BBBB --> FFFF[IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream]
    CCCC --> GGGG[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]

    DDDD --> HHHH[IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]
    EEEE --> IIII[IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]
    FFFF --> JJJJ[IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic]
    GGGG --> KKKK[IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController]

    style A fill:#e1f5fe,color:#000000
    style E fill:#ffb74d,color:#000000
    style O fill:#ffb74d,color:#000000
    style HH fill:#ffb74d,color:#000000
    style JJ fill:#ffb74d,color:#000000
    style FFF fill:#ffb74d,color:#000000
    style VVV fill:#ffb74d,color:#000000
    style C fill:#f8bbd9,color:#000000

    style R fill:#ffcdd2,color:#000000
    style S fill:#c8e6c9,color:#000000
    style T fill:#fff3e0,color:#000000
    style MMM fill:#e3f2fd,color:#000000
    style SSS fill:#e3f2fd,color:#000000
    style HHHH fill:#e1f5fe,color:#000000
